website_summaries.verdict: A sleek bag with plenty of pockets for everything.
pros: This carrying case has room for the console, a headset, 2 controllers, 6 games, and cables, with separate compartments for everything
The rubber feet protect your gear when you set the bag down, and the material is durable
cons: Many customers had difficulty fitting the PS4 Pro
Little padding to protect the console

customer_reviews.title: Great case for the money
customer_reviews.text: This case has alot of room and fit my ps4, controller, TB headset and charging cradle, cooling fan, and wires perfectly. The reason for the 4/5 star is the padding is very thin. but with everything strapped in and zippered, everything stays in place nice and tight. just dont throw it around. It does have some extra rubber absorbers on the bottom though. Has velcro handle. Adjustable shoulder strap. This is one of the best carrying cases ive found yet! Id definitely buy it again if i had to.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: It fits 500GB PS4 and 160GB (Slim PS3)
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. It fit my 500GB PS4 as well as both controllers and power cord and HDMI cable. It also fit my 160GB PS3 (Slim model) along with controllers and power cord and HDMI cable........ My PS3 is not the bulky 20,40,60 GB original model. It is the slim model at 120 or 160 GB...... This is definitely worth the money the straps and padding are good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you have a ps4 pro.
customer_reviews.text: You can not use this bag if you have a ps4 pro. It will not fit no matter which way you try to position the ps4 pro.
customer_reviews.author: James Gossett III

customer_reviews.title: Warning: This case does NOT fit a PS4 Pro
customer_reviews.text: This is a very solid carrying case to carry your video game system and it is very sturdy as I use the same bag to transport my Xbox One S back and forth to a friends house, however it does NOT fit a PS4 Pro as someone stated incorrectly in the Q & A section. It is about 2 inches to short to fit a PS4 Pro due to its bulkier size and the 45 degree angles on both sides. If you are looking to transport your PS4 Pro do not purchase this item.
customer_reviews.author: Corey S Blanchette

customer_reviews.title: It is a great carrying case
customer_reviews.text: It is a great carrying case. I can fit all the games I want to take with me. I put in both my controllers. I store my power chord and HDMI in the zipper bag along with the bluetooth dongle for my ps4 gold wireless headset and the charging cable for the controllers/headset.I have taken multiple flights with this carring case and my PS4. Everything fits and the case fits in the overhead storage or in the under seat storage too. It is just what i was looking for. Straps are durable and I like that the shoulder strap is adjustable. It still looks brand new after 1.5 years. GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Brayan

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT fit a PS4 Pro.
customer_reviews.text: The bag is nice but I'm extremely disappointed. This doesn't fit a PS4 Pro at all and some of the answered questions implied that it could. They also didn't state in the description that it wouldn't. I needed this for holiday travel and it's too late to return or buy a different one. Super annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my grandkid for their ps4. still using it to this day and loves it. been good on a teens normal wear and tear. its not really super padded or anything but the slots etc are useful and its tough enough it is slung around etc and nothing has broken. honestly it doesnt seem like a cheap case at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lesa Stutts

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to carry and it also looks professional
customer_reviews.text: This carrying case is big enough to fit 3 controllers and all the cables. It is easy to carry and it also looks professional. It does not take up a lot of space and it can handle some damage. The extra compartment can be used as it states or it can be used to carry other stuff. Overall I really did like this case.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Good quality has held up well had it a little over a year now still looks brand new
customer_reviews.text: I waited awhile to review this item I wanted to see how it would hold up. My daughter carries her PS4 quite a bit back and forth and this case has been perfect. Good quality lots of storage. I would recommend this case to anyone that likes to transport there PS4.
customer_reviews.author: Scubasteve

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal Good Price!
customer_reviews.text: This case is phenomenal and does a good job for when I travel around with my PS4. I have the PS4 slim and it fits it rather well, though you do have to make sure you tighten the velcro straps across the console correctly. Keep in mind, this is a soft case, not a hard one. It *does* have little "feet" that help the case to stand up when you set it down. Overall, for the cost, it is a very good and reasonable case.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it! However
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it! However, it needs more space for extra controllers. As of now, it has space for a max of three if you aren't packaging any cables with it. It only has an specific place for one controller, but I fit another on in the zip up part.
customer_reviews.author: Helen or Adam

customer_reviews.title: CTA
customer_reviews.text: Best travel bag 💼 I have ever purchased its light and easy to carry around and I have all my stuff in it never have a problem with it very useful I love it and recommended it to anyone want to travel and take his/her Playstation 🎮 with hoim/her. 😍😍😍
customer_reviews.author: abu3mrh

customer_reviews.title: Great for carrying your game system
customer_reviews.text: Great for carrying your game system. The only issue I have with this case is that it’s made somewhat cheap. The zipper had messed up on me by acting like it wouldn’t zip or by the zipper splitting but other than that I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Evans

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price indeed
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely designed case. I use this case every week. Holds the system securely and I really love the remove able pouch. I use that for the controller and all the cables. Be sure to tightly secure the Velcro across the ps4 when storing. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: RMC

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: All-around nice tote for my PlayStation only thing I wish they would have reinforced it with some type of industrial-strength cardboard or hard plastic because the case is kind of flimsy but real me so I guess they compensates and the reason they be PlayStation logo on the bag so people don't know What's in it.
customer_reviews.author: @dreadvill_510

customer_reviews.title: Protective case
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these- one for each son. They haul their gaming system to friends houses. Great case. Protects game very well. They had to look up online how to pack the system in it. No instruanx they wanted to make sure it was secure
customer_reviews.author: Angela J. Martens

customer_reviews.title: Great buy at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for the PS4. Carries it just as well as you would expect and I would buy another if needed. I don't think it is necessary to write a long review. The case is good quality and I feel that my system is well protected when being carried in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: It's really nice and provides all the pockets necessary for multiple controllers and all the necessary cords. If you don't use PlayStation move then the removable pocket inside fits up to 2 controllers. Very handy. My only complaint is that it isn't as cushy on the outside so it probably wouldn't save the system from too big of a fall but will protect it from a drop or two.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Affordable carrying case.
customer_reviews.text: Does what you'd expect. Quality is eh at best. But it's sufficient enough.
customer_reviews.author: Dudercheeto

customer_reviews.title: Everything fits nicely.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift for my son to take his ps4 to his moms. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Everything fits and fits well. The straps are wonderful and it keeps everything safe and secure and private so if you are traveling it looks like a briefcase vs I have a PS4 in here.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Smiles

customer_reviews.title: Great for taking your PS3/PS4 and keeping things organized.
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome I used it every time I take my PS3 or PS4 to a friends or family's house. The PS4 fits more snugly than the PS3, my PS3 is of the Super Slim variety though so it's too be expected. I don't feel comfortable taking my games out of their cases to put them into the slots provided so I usually just put them into the front pocket where about 2 blue-ray size cases fit awesomely. Everything else is just perfect once you figure out what best works for you.
customer_reviews.author: ImNuckingFuttsToni

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I've used this constantly to transport my PS4 to and from college. Stores everything perfectly. It's not a hard case, so you still have to be careful during transport, but it will keep the system safe if you let go of it while walking.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything fits perfectly in the case. It has plenty of space for all the components.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: This is the best gift I could've given my boyfriend as an early ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best gift I could've given my boyfriend as an early holiday present. It fits his PS4, two controllers, a controller charging doc, all the cords, and a couple other things. It's easy to carry as well.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Stavale

customer_reviews.title: we bought two bags that are just as good. Granted it's not as padded as theirs
customer_reviews.text: This is everything we needed. For half the price of the PlayStation brand; we bought two bags that are just as good. Granted it's not as padded as theirs, but it's more spacious to fit more accessories. We travel with our Playstations often and needed something sturdy to use. I'm able to even fit my PlayStation Wireless gold headset when I remove the camera pocket. Also has enough room for me to toss my laptop in there.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: It does what it do.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed it to be. A solid carry case for a PS4 that allows for the accessories, controllers, and a few games.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: It has great options for storing all the cords and controllers
customer_reviews.text: I got this after I installed a Nyco Databank on my PS4 which made it not possible for me to fit the unit the carrying case I already had. This case has plenty of room for to fit my enlarged PS4. It has great options for storing all the cords and controllers.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Better than the PS4 official bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought the PS4 official bag first and the bottom got loose before I even used it. So I returned it and bought this one instead, it's solid and spacious inside plus saving me a few bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Wang

customer_reviews.title: love them they do a great job carrying my Xbox ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought both the Xbox and PS bags, no difference. Still, love them they do a great job carrying my Xbox one S and PS4 Pro.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Nice. Cheaper Than Sony's. Durable Enough.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this case for over a year. At least 4 dozens trips with it. The fabric above the blu ray disc holder has torn, but other than that, it is tough and perfect for carrying my PS4.
customer_reviews.author: James B. Rambo

customer_reviews.title: PS4 Mover
customer_reviews.text: Carries my PS4 just fine. Makes it easy to transport my PS4 and all my peripherals. Does not protect it much though. I wouldn't trust this thing as luggage on an airline. I tend to make just it doesn't get bumped dropped or jostled when using it to transport my PS4
customer_reviews.author: JBC

customer_reviews.title: ... a gift so I only assume it was a great buy! The person I bought it for though
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift so I only assume it was a great buy! The person I bought it for though, loved it!!
customer_reviews.author: joe g.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good case for price
customer_reviews.text: This carrying case has compartments to hold gadgets, controllers, cords, as well as a ps3 system itself. So far I don't find anything about this product objectionable.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Local use only
customer_reviews.text: Nice and roomy, shoulder harness let loose on first day of airport travels, be mindful...

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bag!
customer_reviews.text: It is so perfect for my PlayStation 4, I love it! The Disc hold things is kinda rough, but I will leave disc in box thing and put it in front of bag. Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. Simply amazing.
customer_reviews.text: This case is one of the best PS4 cases out there. It is very spacious with room for the console, several controllers, games, cords, the camera, v-stand, and anything else you might have. This is a must have for anyone that has a ps4.
customer_reviews.author: Ebbmike

customer_reviews.title: He was using a canvas bag and this is much easier and offers better protection. He was even able to fit 8 ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son and he loves it. He was using a canvas bag and this is much easier and offers better protection. He was even able to fit 8 games with cases with all his other components.
customer_reviews.author: ar6474

customer_reviews.title: It is very sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: This case holds everything needed. It is very sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Ripped when I received it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses it all the time when she comes home from college. The only negative is that the bag was slightly ripped on the inside when we received it, so I have to put a few stitches in it to mend it back together.
customer_reviews.author: C. TillerJr

customer_reviews.title: $ Bang for your buck $
customer_reviews.text: Good quality sturdy bag. Recommend CTS over other brands. Haven't had the same luck with other "budget brands"

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, in general
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, in general, to carry your PS4, However, I would not trust to put my games in the Disk slots. I rather carry them in the front pocket with their cases.
customer_reviews.author: GQL1981

customer_reviews.title: Cats suck
customer_reviews.text: Loved it until my friends cat pissed on it. Keep it away from animals.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Using it for a PS4 Pro, it's a tight fit but it works!

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good. Durable and stable. Use it to travel back and forth between states. Had it for 3 months now. I like it. Fits what is needed.

customer_reviews.title: Great protection and plenty storage
customer_reviews.text: Grandson uses carry his PS4. Great protection and plenty storage.

customer_reviews.title: Feels sturdy, good product
customer_reviews.text: This is great for everything I need except disc packaging. I don't trust it to hold my disc and protect them, so I have a book with sleeves for the discs. The case has enough pockets and space for you to carry a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: CustomerHero

customer_reviews.title: I would have liked a tighter fit
customer_reviews.text: The bag holds the PS4 in place but seems a little big for it once you've closed up the bag. I would have liked a tighter fit.

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit ps4 it is way to small in every way possible. Would not recommend.

customer_reviews.title: not only it looks great and it is compact but id does protect my ...
customer_reviews.text: I travel alot and this came in very handy. not only it looks great and it is compact but id does protect my ps4. the material is very strong.

customer_reviews.title: Works great. I use it all the time when traveling ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I use it all the time when traveling with my ps4. I can fit all my gear and is roomy enough to fit my external hard drive on my ps4. It is lite weight and durable, keeps everything inside safe and secure when it gets bounced around.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: Great for carrying my son's playstation through the airport. I only wish it has a bit more padding.

customer_reviews.text: Zipper broke, but if I zip it to the right side, it's less likely to open so 3 stars seems reasonable

customer_reviews.title: and you would like to bring your PS4 with you
customer_reviews.text: If you travel a lot, and you would like to bring your PS4 with you. This is what you need. The bag is perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Good carrying case for PS4
customer_reviews.text: Good carrying case for PS4, fit everything in it just fine and traveled well. It didn't feel particularly well protected, but good enough if you are careful with it. The adjustable strap and handle combine to make it versatile in however you wish to carry it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag! I was having to travel with my ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! I was having to travel with my ps4 in the box it came in but not no more 😁

customer_reviews.title: Console portability.
customer_reviews.text: I'll be using this for years to come, fits almost every console I have, well made and spacious. Great price too considering most others were nearly double the price. Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Carries all of my PS4 equipment with two controllers and a few games perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: Makes traveling with my PS3 so much easier. I'm sure if one were inclined, more than 6 disc's could fit. Originally shipped a defective product; replacement in my possession in 5 days, thanks to Amazon customer service. I couldn't be happier!! :)

customer_reviews.title: ... it would be a bit bigger but it seems like it will do the job
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would be a bit bigger but it seems like it will do the job! Thanks!

customer_reviews.text: Lots of padding. Easy to stow in car. Overall, decent carrying case.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like it, works great. Nothing wrong with product or packaging.

customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this carrying case. It neatly fits all of the PS4 supplies that I have. It's great for traveling and I like the discreet and professional look of the bag.

customer_reviews.title: Not ps4 pro compatable.
customer_reviews.text: I was assuming that the ps4 pro would fit since it is only slightly larger. It does not. So now I have a bag that I have no use for. The fit on my standard ps4 is so tight I really wouldn't use this much. The padding on the edges are very thin and not very absorbing. Overall you get what you pay for. A cheap bag that is cheaply built.

customer_reviews.title: nice for the price

customer_reviews.text: This was a worthwhile purchase and is a perfect fit for my PS4 as carry-on luggage. The only reason this isn't 5 stars is that it lacks significant padding given the delicate nature of the console.

customer_reviews.title: Well put together!!
customer_reviews.text: Well put together for the console, cords, etc., but does not hold a lot of games. Great source of transport!

customer_reviews.title: Works great and did everything it said it would
customer_reviews.text: Works great and did everything it said it would. No complaints and if you want to travel with your gaming console I would highly recommend this case. 5 Stars all the way.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Holds the Playstation firmly, along with your extra cords and games, I'm happy to have this instead of a regular backpack, it makes all the difference in me feeling safe bringing my items with me on a trip, definitly worth the money. Well done!

customer_reviews.text: Great value and product for my sons PS4 needs. Highly recommend this product!

customer_reviews.text: Awesome, makes moving the ps4 much easier and much more secure. Everything fits perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Item is exactly as described. Works perfectly!! Great seller, fast shipping, fair price!
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Hasman

customer_reviews.title: Survived 4 hour flight
customer_reviews.text: Good quality bag. Protects PS4 well. Used this for travel and put it inside another suitcase for a 4 hour flight. Survived the check in baggage without any scratches or damage on the ps4. Not sure if it was because the suitcase protected it but the bag certainly protected it from my other things inside the suitcase. Detachable bag is a great option for additional controller or camera. All the other pockets are good for the wires as well. Overall good product.

customer_reviews.title: but is a very nice

customer_reviews.title: and several games (even with the cases) in this bad boy.
customer_reviews.text: I can fit my ps4, 2 controllers, camera, and several games (even with the cases) in this bad boy.

customer_reviews.title: Must get
customer_reviews.text: I use this frequently! Perfect fit and still have space.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The case came in as expected. The case fits my PS4 perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Caelan Miller

customer_reviews.title: A great case! Except UPS issued a severe beat-down
customer_reviews.text: I guess the guys over at UPS decided to issue a severe beat-down on my package. It got pushed,shoved,kicked, and thrown I swear. However, despite this the content inside was just fine. The bag works just fine to carry my PS4 around, it's much easier than carrying it in its launch box. It is a little tight, but for good measure it's very secure. I was able to hold two blue ray cases in the front pocket, console, and power cables with space left over. Overall it's a nice tote to carry around your PS4.
customer_reviews.author: Cache

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my PS4.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for my PS4. Holds several games/movies securely. The Velcro that holds the pouch in place holds well, the pouch itself holds 2 controlers as well as charge cables. Another pouch holds another controller and more cables. The pocket on the outside holds 4 ps4 games in their case plus my 3tb external hard drive. The straps hold my system in place very securely so o don't have to worry about it sliding around. Sturdy construction and good zippers make this a fantastic case for a gaming system.
customer_reviews.author: R Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product for travelers
customer_reviews.text: Comes a bit smaller than what it looks like in the picture but keeps the ps4 really safe lots of space in it.
customer_reviews.author: Zach W.

customer_reviews.title: Great for TSA-PreCheck
customer_reviews.text: Great functional case. It is pretty roomy and has allowed me to take my PS4 as a carryon on multiple flights.

customer_reviews.title: Not enough padding
customer_reviews.text: I had to return it. The padding was thinner than expected and i felt that ther was inadequate protection relative to the mass of the system.

customer_reviews.title: Must Read!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and very spacious!!! In pics is 8 games 1 controller (could fit 2) ps4 counsel like 10 cords (could fit more) turtle beach stealth 400 and one external pocket with nothing in it! Could use more padding but I bought it for the space!!! 10 out of 10! Would reccomend to anyone! Also I haven't even used the 6 disc slots!!

customer_reviews.title: great accessories for my ps4
customer_reviews.text: great bag for my ps4 and accessories the built quality is good as well i highly recommend this carry case it doesn't have the Playstation brand logo thats why its cost was very reasonable but i prefer this so when im traveling no one knows whats in my bag
customer_reviews.author: Robert edwards

product_meta.title: CTA DigitalMulti-Function Carrying Case for PlayStation 4 PS4-MFC
product_meta.description: Platform:PlayStation 4Comfortably travel and carry your gaming system wherever you go with CTA Digital’s Multi-Function Carrying Case for PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 3. This case is specifically designed to store and carry these consoles plus the PlayStation Camera, games, and accessories, with the extra protection they need to stay secure during travel. Made with durable nylon fabric and protective foam padding, the carrying case is the perfect solution for any gamer on the go. Built-in straps are designed to secure the console and keep it stationary during transit. The case includes storage for 6 games inside the convenient disc slots, as well as internal and external pockets for controllers, cables, and anything else you may need to go along with your gaming system. Inside the case, you’ll also find a 48-inch adjustable shoulder strap, and a separate foam padded pouch for the PlayStation Camera, which can be securely attached inside the case. Features include: * Compact design perfect for travel * Durable nylon fabric * 2 Built-in straps to secure the console * 2 External pockets for accessories * 2 Internal pockets for accessories * 1 Removable pouch designed for the PlayStation Camera * 6 Disc pockets Specifications: * Compatible with PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 3 * Dimensions: 14.25 x 12.25 x 6.5 inches Package Includes: (1) Multi-Function Carrying Case (1) Removable pouch for camera (1) 48-Inch adjustable strap
